sentence.Network_en: Comet also sired the champion foal out of Spinway Harvest.
sentence.Network_cn: “彗星”还跟“斯平威·哈维斯特”生下了这匹出类拔萃的小马驹。

sentence.Network_en: He will offer the first harvest of rice to the sun goddess.
sentence.Network_cn: 他将把收获的第一束稻子献给太阳女神。

sentence.Network_en: Unfavourable weather has had damaging effects on this year's harvest.
sentence.Network_cn: 恶劣天气使今年的收成受到了损失。

means.word_mean: 1. erect perennial Old World herb of dry grassy habitats

auth_sentence.content: The harvest situation has been very bad this year.

auth_sentence.content: At the Harvest Festival the usual jubilation was absent.
